short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamically bookmark the last visited page. Useful for reading long documentation and tutorials

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Last Visit is a simple bookmark app. It tracks the last visited page of a site so that you can continue where you left off. Best suited for reading long documentation and tutorials
